transitions.message: We'll start by asking you questions about your symptoms.
Now let's take photos for your doctor to make a diagnosis.
Now we'll ask you some questions about your past medical history.
That's all the information your doctor will need!

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_systemic_or_dangerous_symptoms
questions.question_title: Let’s make sure Spruce is right for you. Are you experiencing any of the following?

popup.text: This question helps assess whether you're healthy enough to be diagnosed and treated remotely.

body.text: Your symptoms suggest that you may need more immediate medical attention than we can currently provide. A local emergency department is an appropriate option, as is your primary care provider.

screens.content_header_title: We're going to have to end your visit here.

body.text:
If you have health insurance, you should contact your insurance company to find out which providers are covered under your plan. Locate your insurance card and call the listed Member Services number. A representative will help you locate your nearest in-network emergency department. If you are too ill to accomplish this, call 911 and go to the nearest emergency department.

If you do not have health insurance, go to the most convenient emergency department.

screens.content_header_title: You should seek in-person medical evaluation today. A local emergency department is an appropriate option, as is your primary care provider (if you can be seen immediately today).

potential_answers.potential_answer_summary: Own any pets or spend time with animals

potential_answers.potential_answer_summary: Do a job or hobby that exposes you to irritants

popup.text: Anything that your skin, hair, or nails might be repeatedly exposed to.

potential_answers.potential_answer: Spend time in very hot or very cold places

potential_answers.potential_answer: Spend time in very dry or very humid places

screens.header_title: Take photos of the areas where you are currently experiencing a rash.
screens.header_subtitle: Photo quality matters. Your doctor will use these photos to make a diagnosis.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_face
questions.question_title: Face

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of the front of your face is required to continue.
client_data.tip: Center your face in the dotted lines.

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of the side of your face is required to continue.
client_data.tip: Turn your face to the side.
client_data.tip_subtext: Just move your face, not your phone.

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A second photo of the side of your face is required to continue.
client_data.tip: Now turn to the other side.
client_data.tip_subtext: Just move your face, not your phone.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_lips
questions.question_title: Lips

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of your lips is required to continue.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_scalp
questions.question_title: Scalp

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.
client_data.tip: Pull back or part hair so your scalp is visible.
client_data.tip_subtext: Use a mirror to help take this photo.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_neck
questions.question_title: Neck

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_chest
questions.question_title: Chest

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.
client_data.tip: Remove any clothing covering your chest.

questions.question_title: Back

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.
client_data.tip: This is a tough photo to take, using a mirror can help.

questions.question_title: Abdomen

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_legs

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: A photo of this area is required to continue.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_feet
questions.question_title: Feet

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: Photos of the tops of your feet are required to continue.
client_data.tip: Take photos of the tops of your feet resting on a flat surface.

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: Photo of the bottoms of your feet are required to continue.
client_data.tip: Now take photos of the bottoms of your feet.

questions.question: q_derm_psoriasis_hands
questions.question_title: Hands

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: Photos of the tops of your hands are required to continue.
client_data.tip: Take photos of the tops of your hands resting on a flat surface.

client_data.photo_missing_error_message: Photos of the bottoms of your hands are required to continue.
client_data.tip: Now turn your hands over and take photos of the palms of your hands.

body.text: Any illness that has already required hospitalization should be reassessed urgently and in person by a medical professional. Please attempt to reach the staff at your previous hospital, or tap 'Next Steps' for how to proceed.

screens.content_header_title: We're going to have to end your visit here.

body.text:
If you have health insurance, you should contact your insurance company to find out which providers are covered under your plan. Locate your insurance card and call the listed Member Services number. A representative will help you locate your nearest in-network urgent care center or other appropriate provider. If you are too ill to accomplish this, call 911 and go to the nearest emergency department.

If you do not have health insurance, go to the most convenient urgent care or emergency department.

1st Trimester: Week 1 to Week 12

popup.text: First-degree relatives include parents, siblings, and children. Second-degree relatives include grandparents.

submission_confirmation.title: Visit Submitted!
submission_confirmation.top_text: Your psoriasis visit has been submitted.
submission_confirmation.bottom_text: Your doctor will review your visit and respond in 24 hours.

checkout.header_text: In 24 hours your doctor will review your visit and create your treatment plan.
checkout.footer_text: There are no surprise medical bills with Spruce. If you're unsatisfied with your visit, we'll refund the full cost.
